page.title: 19RIVERS AND LANDSCAPE
page.content: In Broadclyst we have{1 river}.The river is called{"RIVER CLYST"}.It runs by our school.These are the fish you can find in the river:{Trouts,eels and minnows.The river has lots of wildlife around it.E.g willows.The human life on the river is varied.For example: the farmers use it to feed crops, biologists for research and watermills for power.The Clyst starts at Clyst St.Lawrence and flows into the Exe. -------------------------------------- The{LANDSCAPE}around our school is mainly fields & hills.There's Ashclyst forest about 2 miles away.There's a farm near the school.We also have the B3181 runing past.There are several houses at the end of the school.In the school we have an orchard and two ponds.Altogether the{LANDSCAPE}is very mixed. {ROBERT GLOVER. ______ _______
